description: The Mompe is a garment that is popular among women and mens, even today, for a convenient attire to wear to work. These Mompe have become popular in foreign countries such as America.  The American people, wear them to work in the gardens and even going into town for shopping. It seems that they are suitable and fashionable among house-wives.
